duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and maintain iOS applications using the Cordova framework and JavaScript.
Develop server-side applications using PHP and the Laravel framework.
Develop interactive and dynamic user interfaces using React and related technologies.
Utilize Docker to containerize applications and streamline deployment processes.
Apply strong object-oriented programming principles (OOP) and utilize data structures effectively.
Leverage knowledge of Elastic Search for efficient data retrieval and manipulation.
Contribute to web development tasks and collaborate on back-end and front-end features.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (Master’s preferred)
